title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Through Passion-Based Learning and Portfolio Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational scientific theories, experimental methods, and experience conducting basic research
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance learners' self-directedness and expertise through science field internships linked to real-world contexts and portfolio-based assessments. Learners participate in online/offline activities using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can select passion-driven topics in science and develop an internship plan.
Learners can create a portfolio demonstrating practical competencies in science based on field experience.
Learners refine their portfolios with expert feedback and systematically present scientific problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
